sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Box,Stack,Typography} from '@mui/material' import SideBar from './SideBar' import Videos from './Videos' import { FetchFromApi } from '../utils/FetchFromApi' const Feed = () => { const [selectedCategories, setselectedCategories] = useState("New") useEffect(() => { FetchFromApi(`search?part=snippet&q=${selectedCategories}`) } ,[selectedCategories]) return ( Copyright 2022 YT clone New Videos ) } export default Feed
